paragraphs.body: The page was never intended to be expanded — the idea is to keep it as simple as possible. It literally means what it says, a line of policy intended to counteract users from deliberately using the bureaucracy of various rules to get their way and to encourage boldness in making changes. See the Wikipedia equivalent. The 888th Avatar (talk) 07:27, July 2, 2011 (UTC)
